title: Fostering Failure: How the investigation was done
description: Through California Public Records Act requests, The Chronicle obtained data from 2015 and 2016 showing arrests and calls for service from the addresses of the state's 10 shelters and, in some counties, what happened to children who were charged with crimes.
seo_title: Fostering Failure: How the investigation was done
twitter_text: Fostering Failure: How The Chronicle investigation was done.
